resources.string:
Hi everyone this is Johnly Benil J G here,
 
 
I am currently studying my pre final year of my college. Life is really great for me if i do say so myself. Got rejected in almost any company I attend some i get rejected in the first round and in others the next round. I am very proud of my achievements. All my friend are getting placed in some MNCs and here I am starting to develop some basic android apps knowing fully I wont go anywhere with the skill I have. Don't think i am always negative I used to be so much positive anf full of energy. I got nothing from being that. The rejected me saying I have no coding knowledge my codes are not modular even if i get output. I was so frustrated with whats happening now. The only light that i have is the smile in the faces of my father and mother. I hope someday I will make them proud. I want them to live a happy and peaceful life without worrying about me. Just put faith in god they say, if you can really see what i type please show me a way. 
 
 
 
 By 
Johnly
